oops,i forgot to say :

new details for these drivers :
a new opengl version is present in this new version to test as few users have experienced a specifc bug on previous version 8.85.6rc1
btw,it seems Microsoft are actualy working too on this specific bug on opengl and should release soon a bug fix who should be avalaible asap by windows update then.
regards
